title: Edward Hopper Nighthawks Umbrella
description:
Umbrella developed from Edward Hopper’s Nighthawks, 1942, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Open up one of the best-known images of twentieth-century art, and take a walk in the rain.

  • Dimensions: Closed- 10.5 x 2 in.  Open – 37 in.
  • Materials: Polyester, Aluminum, Rubber.
  • Auto open, manual close.
  • Storage sleeve for umbrella included.
